title: Absolutely insane lag
body: On Rogers canada, usually have 25 ping stable no dcs ever. since the mini patch this afternoon Im lagging to 1000 ping and dcing. what the hell is this?

replies.body: Exactly same issue here in Toronto. Ping went up to 500 every 2 to 3 mins. Dcd every several minutes in rank games. Have Riot realized this issue yet ?

Same.  Rogers, from Toronto, usually a stable 24.  Last game I was dropping out every 3-6 minutes.  I haven't played much this week, and it was my first game.  Is there any indication on what this could be?

[Edit]
Confirmed ISP problem.  It's happening to people playing multiple games, etc.  The only thing I can find Roger wise in terms of updates is "We're aware there's a problem in Ont." on their main website, and a 3 hour ETA on the fix from about 2h ago.  Doesn't seem likely they'll solve it soon.  Seems like it issue started around 12-2 p.m. today (or at least people started reporting it around then).
I'm in Canada as well and I've been experiencing huge lag spikes within the 1000+ range which is unusual for me. It's definitely a problem on Riot's end because my ISP's ping is stable.
Me too like exactly. On rogers in ottawa. 31 ms to dcs two or more times per game with a stable ping in between.

Thanks for letting us know about the lag spikes you've been getting! Rogers ISP confirmed that they are having some issues with their internet service. To stay more up to date on Roger's progress with this, feel free to check them out on their [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RogersHelps/status/839999412164157441).

Thanks for staying patient while this issue gets ironed out!

Went up to 3.1k ms today....played on a server in Korea 250ms....Riot fix your connection
 Digicel ISP Trinidad and Tobago.

Exactly, I tried resetting my internet , shutting down every single process which was using any type of network time but nothing. 
Massive lag , 4 lost games, Cant even play 1 game without massive lag spikes. 

I would also start the game with no gold and no visible champions. I would have to dc and reconnect again. 

Please fix. This has been happening  since the new patch. {{item:3151}}

Exactly the same issue in Toronto. I lost 3 games in a row because of this and got 5 restricted games. Please rogers fix this!!
Exact same issue at this rate im a drop from gold which is total bs

Same here, Bell Canada. I'm sitting at a constant 30 ping and never experience lag. Last game I was randomly skyrocketing and trying to reconnect. It was only happening to me. While I was trying to reconnect, I was able to watch max res youtube videos without any issue. This is beyond stupid.
